title: Effect of Panax Ginseng on the Cognitive Performance in Alzheimer's Disease
text:
Summary: We investigate the clinical efficacy of Panax ginseng in Alzheimer's disease (AD).
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 Alzheimer's disease 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 other neurologic disease
